long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Archmage is an fully open source browser extension for accessing Web3 DApps and blockchains.

The extension injects the blockchain Web3 API into every website's javascript context, so that dapps can read from and write to the blockchain.

Archmage lets the user create and manage their own wallets, and review every transaction initiated by a DApp, and approving or rejecting it.

Because it adds functionality to the normal browser context, Archmage requires the permission to read and write to any webpage. You can always "view the source" of Archmage the way you do within any Chrome extension, or view the source code on Github:
https://github.com/archmage-live/archmage-x
